This is Emma (1996) TV Version with Kate Beckinsale!

Quality isnt Perfect, itz Widescreen! i dont think this is a very good version! 

Bt a relatively excellent copy! so if u really wanna watch the TV Version u better download this 1...if itz the movie ur searching for, luk sumwhere else!
Thank you! A big fan of Mark Strong and Kate....

The Ruby Ring (TV 1997)
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0134942/
Young Lucy McLaughlin's father has lost his job and to help make ends meet she is sent to live with her Grandmother. To help her get over her loss, the old lady gives Lucy a magic ring which will grant her two wishes...
